docs.snippet: A powerful storm system that moved across the South on Monday killed four people in Alabama and left a trail of damage over several states, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A powerful storm system that moved across the South on Monday killed four people in Alabama and left a trail of damage over several states, officials said.

headline.main: Storms Kill 4, Damage Buildings Across Southern States
headline.print_headline: Storms Kill 4, Damage Buildings Across Southern States

docs.snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho repeated his complaints about the Premier League's festive fixture pile-up after his side laboured to a 2-0 win at 10-man West Ham United on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho repeated his complaints about the Premier League's festive fixture pile-up after his side laboured to a 2-0 win at 10-man West Ham United on Monday.

docs.snippet: Olympic skiing champion Jean Vuarnet, who helped pioneer the aerodynamic tuck position for downhill racers but suffered tragedy with the deaths of his wife and son in a doomsday cult murder-suicide, has died, the French Olympic Committee announced...
docs.lead_paragraph: Olympic skiing champion Jean Vuarnet, who helped pioneer the aerodynamic tuck position for downhill racers but suffered tragedy with the deaths of his wife and son in a doomsday cult murder-suicide, has died, the French Olympic Committee announced Monday. He was 83.

headline.main: Skier Jean Vuarnet, Who Struck Gold With Tuck Position, Dies
headline.print_headline: Skier Jean Vuarnet, Who Struck Gold With Tuck Position, Dies

docs.snippet: Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Monday that a former radical who drove a getaway car during a 1981 Brinks armed car robbery that left three dead impressed him as community-minded when they met before he commuted her sentence to let her seek parole....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Monday that a former radical who drove a getaway car during a 1981 Brinks armed car robbery that left three dead impressed him as community-minded when they met before he commuted her sentence to let her seek parole.

headline.main: NY Governor: Brinks Heist Getaway Driver Is Community-Minded
headline.print_headline: NY Governor: Brinks Heist Getaway Driver Is Community-Minded

docs.snippet: Murders in El Salvador fell by more than a fifth in 2016 after soaring to one of the highest rates anywhere around the globe the previous year, police data in the Central American nation showed on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Murders in El Salvador fell by more than a fifth in 2016 after soaring to one of the highest rates anywhere around the globe the previous year, police data in the Central American nation showed on Monday.

headline.main: Murders in Notoriously Violent El Salvador Drop 20 Percent in 2016: Police
headline.print_headline: Murders in Notoriously Violent El Salvador Drop 20 Percent in 2016: Police

docs.snippet: With more than $125 billion in acquisitions last year, more non-tech companies than ever are forgoing building technology in-house and acquiring start-ups....

headline.main: For Non-Tech Companies, if You Can’t Build It, Buy a Start-Up
headline.print_headline: Outsiders Join Scramble for Tech Start-Ups

docs.snippet: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said in a Twitter message on Monday that Chicago's mayor must ask for U.S. government help if the city fails to reduce its homicide rate, which hit a 20-year high in 2016....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said in a Twitter message on Monday that Chicago's mayor must ask for U.S. government help if the city fails to reduce its homicide rate, which hit a 20-year high in 2016.

headline.main: Trump Says Chicago Must Seek U.S. Help if No Progress Cutting Murders
headline.print_headline: Trump Says Chicago Must Seek U.S. Help if No Progress Cutting Murders

docs.snippet: A new, Republican-controlled U.S. Congress convenes on Tuesday eager to repeal major portions of President Barack Obama's healthcare law and roll back environmental and financial industry regulations, but could quickly become embroiled in fights o...
docs.lead_paragraph: A new, Republican-controlled U.S. Congress convenes on Tuesday eager to repeal major portions of President Barack Obama's healthcare law and roll back environmental and financial industry regulations, but could quickly become embroiled in fights over President-elect Donald Trump's Cabinet choices.

headline.main: New Congress Prepares to Undo Obamacare, Weigh Trump Personnel Picks
headline.print_headline: New Congress Prepares to Undo Obamacare, Weigh Trump Personnel Picks
